2. IOC (International Olympic Committee) - The International Olympic Committee is an independent, non-governmental organization that is responsible for the overall direction and management of the Olympic Games.
3. UCI (Union Cycliste Internationale) - The Union Cycliste Internationale is the governing body of cycling worldwide.
